::Havoc/Repressor::

Havoc raises an eyebrow, looking at Wolfgang like the bot was a little
off his rocker.

"Er... You do realize that Zardus is commander of the Allinace, right?
I've never heard of you before, so don't be issuing orders."

Behind him, Repressor's finger tightens on the trigger of the missile
launcher he was holding.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Wolf Gang" <WarBarge@h...> wrote:
> OOC:wolfgang used to be the alliances co-leader. Wolfgang is a snow
wolf
> 
> :: Wolfgang ::
> 
> :: Once Wolfgang notices the two bots with guns blaring, he reaches
to his 
> side where his ice blaster should be, pulling up a hand full of air.
::
> 
> I recomend that you drop your weapons before I call my troops, the
mighty 
> alliance.
> 
> :: When Wolfgang notices that his ice blaster is missing, he jumps
back and 
> pulls out his outdated, broken, com-link ::
> 
> Alliance members, two bots have broken through our defence and are
armed. 
> Immediate backup is neccesary.
> 
> :: Wolfgang chuckles nervously, remembering lost thoughts
